thread.section_title: Hotel Basile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, modern and well located
thread.title_full: Clean, modern and well located - Review of Hotel Basile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: WissVibes
title: Clean, modern and well located
text:
This is a recently built hotel operating for 4 years now. Everything inside is like brand new, absolutely clean and taken care of. Nice modern decoration.
It is well located, yet in a calm street with few to nothing traffic noise. Double windows climalit anyway to keep the noises out.
Situated near to RER and Metros station. Walking distance to Opera, Louvre, Rivoli etc.
The bed was excellent, with 3 huge pillows, super comfy mattress and everything in perfect conditions. So was the ground, bathroom 100% clean, no mould, as if it has been built 2 days ago.
Rooms have air con, heat, free wifi, kettle with teas and coffees, mini bar to store beverages. Breakfast is ok, nothing crazy.
Staff is very polite and friendly, reception opened 24h.
I recommend it 100%, it's hard to be disappointed by such a nice hotel in Paris.
